sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app>
      <v-container>
        <!-- Top Bar -->
        <v-app-bar app color="blue darken-2" dark>
          <!-- Burger menu icon -->
          <v-btn icon @click="drawer = !drawer">
            <v-icon>mdi-menu</v-icon>
          </v-btn>
          <!-- Title -->
          <v-toolbar-title>{{ userName }}</v-toolbar-title>
          <v-spacer></v-spacer>
          <!-- Logout button -->
          <v-btn icon @click="logout">
            <v-icon>mdi-logout</v-icon>
          </v-btn>
        </v-app-bar>

        <!-- Sidebar -->
        <v-navigation-drawer app v-model="drawer" color="blue darken-2" dark>
          <v-list dense>
            <v-list-item
              v-for="(item, index) in sidebarItems"
              :key="index"
              @click="navigate(index)"
            >
              <v-list-item-action>
                <v-icon>{{ item.icon }}</v-icon>
              </v-list-item-action>
              <v-list-item-content>
                <v-list-item-title>{{ item.title }}</v-list-item-title>
              </v-list-item-content>
            </v-list-item>
          </v-list>
        </v-navigation-drawer>

        <!-- Main Content -->
        <v-main>
          <v-col cols="12" style="max-width: 1000px; margin: 0 auto">
            <v-card class="mx-auto" max-width="800">
              <v-card-title class="blue darken-2 white--text">
                Upload PDF Files
              </v-card-title>
              <v-card-text>
                <v-row>
                  <v-col
                    v-for="(file, fieldName) in pdfFiles"
                    :key="fieldName"
                    cols="12"
                    md="6"
                  >
                    <v-card class="mb-3">
                      <v-card-title>{{ fieldName }}</v-card-title>
                      <v-file-input
                        v-if="!submittedFiles[fieldName]"
                        v-model="pdfFiles[fieldName]"
                        accept=".pdf"
                        :label="'Select ' + fieldName"
                      ></v-file-input>
                      <v-row class="mt-2" v-if="submittedFiles[fieldName]">
                        <v-col cols="4">
                          <v-icon color="blue darken-2" size="48">mdi-file-pdf-box</v-icon>
                        </v-col>
                        <v-col cols="4">
                          <v-btn color="blue darken-2" block @click="downloadFile(submittedFiles[fieldName])">Descargar</v-btn>
                        </v-col>
                        <v-col cols="4">
                          <v-btn color="red darken-2" block @click="deleteFile(fieldName)">Eliminar</v-btn>
                        </v-col>
                      </v-row>
                    </v-card>
                  </v-col>
                </v-row>
              </v-card-text>
              <v-divider class="my-4"></v-divider>
              <v-card-actions>
                <v-btn color="blue darken-2" @click="submitForm">Submit</v-btn>
                <v-btn color="primary" @click="downloadAllFiles">Download All Files</v-btn>
              </v-card-actions>
            </v-card>
          </v-col>
        </v-main>
      </v-container>
    </v-app>
  </template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios'

export default {
  data () {
    return {
      userName: localStorage.getItem('userName'),
      pdfFiles: {
        'Solicitud de residencias profesionales': null,
        'Carta de presentación': null,
        'Carta de aceptación': null,
        'Cartilla IMSS': null,
        'Oficio de Asignación de asesor interno': null,
        Anteproyecto: null,
        'Liberación de los 5 créditos': null,
        'Liberación servicio social': null
      },
      submittedFiles: {},
      drawer: false,
      sidebarItems: [
        { title: 'Proyecto', icon: 'mdi-folder-outline' },
        { title: 'Asesorias', icon: 'mdi-account-plus-outline' },
        { title: 'Archivos', icon: 'mdi-file-document-outline' }
      ],
      userId: localStorage.getItem('id')
    }
  },
  mounted () {
    this.fetchFileData()
  },
  computed: {
    isFormValid () {
      for (const key in this.pdfFiles) {
        if (!this.pdfFiles[key]) {
          return false
        }
      }
      return true
    }
  },
  methods: {
    async fetchFileData () {
      try {
        const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:3000/archivos')
        const files = response.data

        this.submittedFiles = files
        localStorage.setItem('submittedFiles', JSON.stringify(this.submittedFiles))
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error fetching file data:', error)
      }
    },
    navigate (index) {
      switch (index) {
        case 0:
          this.$router.push('/student')
          break
        case 1:
          this.$router.push('/student/asesorias')
          break
        case 2:
          this.$router.push('/student/archivos')
          break
        default:
          break
      }
    },
    logout () {
      localStorage.removeItem('token')
      localStorage.removeItem('user')
      this.$router.push('/login')
    },
    async submitForm () {
      try {
        const formData = new FormData()
        for (const key in this.pdfFiles) {
          if (this.pdfFiles[key]) {
            formData.append('files', this.pdfFiles[key])
          }
        }
        const response = await axios.post(
          'http://localhost:3000/upload-archivo',
          formData,
          {
            headers: {
              'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data'
            }
          }
        )
        if (response.status === 201) {
          window.alert('File uploaded successfully!')
          console.log('File uploaded successfully!')
          // Move uploaded files to submittedFiles
          for (const key in this.pdfFiles) {
            if (this.pdfFiles[key]) {
              this.submittedFiles[key] = this.pdfFiles[key]
            }
          }
          // Save submittedFiles to localStorage
          localStorage.setItem(
            'submittedFiles',
            JSON.stringify(this.submittedFiles)
          )
          // Reset the form after successful upload
          this.pdfFiles = Object.fromEntries(
            Object.keys(this.pdfFiles).map((key) => [key, null])
          )
        } else {
          console.error('Failed to upload file.')
        }
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error uploading files:', error)
      }
    },
    downloadAllFiles () {
      // Download all files logic
    },
    downloadFile (file) {
      // Download individual file logic
    },
    deleteFile (fieldName) {
      const fileId = this.submittedFiles[fieldName]._id
      axios
        .delete(`http://localhost:3000/archivos/${fileId}`)
        .then((response) => {
          if (response.status === 200) {
            // File deleted successfully from the server
            // Now, remove it from the submittedFiles object
            delete this.submittedFiles[fieldName]
            // Update localStorage
            localStorage.setItem(
              'submittedFiles',
              JSON.stringify(this.submittedFiles)
            )
            // Optionally, you can provide feedback to the user
            window.alert('File deleted successfully!')
          } else {
            // Failed to delete file
            console.error('Failed to delete file:', response.data.message)
            window.alert('Failed to delete file. Please try again later.')
          }
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          console.error('Error deleting file:', error)
          window.alert(
            'An error occurred while deleting the file. Please try again later.'
          )
        })
    }
  }
}
</script>

  <style scoped>
  .v-btn i {
    color: white;
  }
  </style>
